trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型中的项。

trans-unit.source: An item is either a node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 项是节点或一个原子值。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> class, you must override the following members: <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.IsNode" />:
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" />类，你必须重写以下成员： <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.IsNode" />:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示项是否表示 XPath 节点或者原子值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item represents an XPath node; <see langword="false" /> if the item represents an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 如果项表示 XPath 节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果项表示原子值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，根据当前项的架构类型以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型的装箱对象的形式获取当前项。

trans-unit.source: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.
trans-unit.target: 以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型的装箱对象形式表示的当前项。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.TypedValue%2A> property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果项的值不符合其指定架构类型的值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.TypedValue%2A>属性的值等效<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see langword="string" /> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取项的 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="string" /> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item's value as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item value as.
trans-unit.target: 返回的项值的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item's value as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A> method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item's value as.
trans-unit.target: 返回的项值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析命名空间前缀的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，以指定用于解析命名空间前缀的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 对象所指定的类型返回项值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A> method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象用于解析与类型转换有关的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，转换时`xs:QName`到`xs:string`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Boolean>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 该项值的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试到 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.DateTime>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 该项值的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试到 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDouble%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDouble%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Double>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <see cref="T:System.Double" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 该项值的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <see cref="T:System.Double" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试到 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsInt%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsInt%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Int32>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 该项值的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试到 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsLong%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsLong%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Int64>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 该项值的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 类型的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试到 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 的强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 该项的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>属性可以获取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的项的类型化值的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`都<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>的<xref:System.Int32>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`，如<xref:System.Int16>或<xref:System.Double>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: All implementers must provide a <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType" /> property for every item, even if it is only <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有的实施者必须提供<see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType" />属性的每个项，即使它只是<see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，将获取项的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.XmlType%2A> property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.XmlType%2A>属性可以获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>项。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>。
